channel.title: CVE Feed for Rexroth -- ctrlX HMI Web Panel - WR21 (WR2107)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rexroth -- ctrlX HMI Web Panel - WR21 (WR2107)

item.title: CVE-2023-43488|2024-09-17T14:06:24.603Z -- rexroth -- ctrlx%20hmi%20web%20panel%20-%20wr21%20%28wr2107%29
item.description: The vulnerability allows a low privileged (untrusted) application to modify a critical system property that should be denied, in order to enable the ADB (Android Debug Bridge) protocol to be exposed on the network, exploiting it to gain a privileged shell on the device without requiring the physical access through USB.
